de.codecrafters.tableview.toolkit

Class SimpleTableHeaderAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.codecrafters.tableview.TableHeaderAdapter
      • de.codecrafters.tableview.toolkit.SimpleTableHeaderAdapter

  • public final class SimpleTableHeaderAdapter
extends TableHeaderAdapter
    Simple implementation of the TableHeaderAdapter. This adapter will render the given header Strings as TextView.
    Author:
    ISchwarz
